name: schema-first-design
description: a POC for schema first design workshop
author: Pradeep Singh <pradeep.singh@talabat.com>

scripts.bundle-schema: node node_modules/swagger-cli/swagger-cli.js validate ./specs/openapi.yaml && node node_modules/swagger-cli/swagger-cli.js bundle ./specs/openapi.yaml --outfile ./specs/.outputs/openapi.yaml --type yaml
scripts.generate-models: cd ./specs && java -Dmodels -DmodelDocs=false -DmodelTests=false -Dapis=false -DapiTests=false -jar ../node_modules/swagger-nodegen-cli/bin/swagger-codegen-cli-3.0.24.jar generate -i openapi.yaml -l csharp -o ../src/Model.WeathersInfo.Com -c csharp-output-config.json && cd .. && mv src/Model.WeathersInfo.Com/src/Model/WeathersInfo.Com/*.* src/Model.WeathersInfo.Com/generated_models && rm -rf src/Model.WeathersInfo.Com/src
